Name: New Year Flask
Description: This container in pale green faience belongs to the "New Year Flasks" category. From the Late Period, the Egyptians engraved their New Year vows on the lentiform  vases decorated with floral and animal motifs. The neck shows a papyrus flower on which two small seated baboons are leaning. They represent the god Thoth, calculator of time and the years. The vows are incised on the flat side of the vase.
